evidence_in_dialogue: [[Archie]] yeah , my girlfriend does it all the time
[[Mrs._Haddick]] who could have done this to my baby ?
[[Catherine]] so mrs mitchell was shot by a bullet traveling 550 feet per second
[[Brass]] here i 'm looking for three guys , but you only found one hammer with blood on it , so who do you want me to follow ?
[[Warrick]] the blood on your shoe is a match to brian haddick 's
[[Young_Mother]] yeah , i heard gunfire a couple of days ago
[[Sara]] we have three hammers and four suspects
